organization.name: DocSpace UK
organization.description: Professional Companies House document download service for UK businesses

mainEntity.name: What documents can I download from Companies House?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can download all publicly available documents including annual returns, accounts, incorporation documents, director changes, share allotments, registered office changes, and mortgage documents.

mainEntity.name: How much does it cost to download company documents?

acceptedAnswer.text: DocSpace charges a flat fee of £5 per company. This gives you access to download ALL available documents for that company as a single ZIP file.

mainEntity.name: How quickly can I download the documents?

acceptedAnswer.text: Documents are downloaded and compiled into a ZIP file within seconds to minutes, depending on the number of documents available for the company.

mainEntity.name: What format are the documents in?

acceptedAnswer.text: All documents are downloaded as PDF files and compiled into a convenient ZIP archive for easy storage and sharing.

howTo.name: How to Download Companies House Documents
howTo.description: Simple steps to download all Companies House documents for any UK company

step.text: Enter the name of the UK company you want to download documents for
step.name: Search for Company

step.text: Click 'Search Company' to find the company in Companies House records
step.name: Initiate Search

step.text: Review the number of documents found and click 'Download All as ZIP'
step.name: Review Results

step.text: Complete the secure £5 payment through Stripe
step.name: Make Payment

step.text: Wait for the automatic download of your ZIP file containing all documents
step.name: Download Documents
